articles.title: Sundar Pichai on the challenge of innovating in a huge company and what he’s excited about this year - TechCrunch
articles.description: It was a notable appearance because Pichai's been having a bit of a rough go lately. Google is widely perceived to have gotten a late start on generative AI.
